content: 10 And Yahweh confused them before Israel, and smote them with a great slaughter at Gibeon,—and chased them along the way that goeth up Beth-horon, and smote them as far as Azekah and as far as Makkedah.
content_old: 10 And Yahweh confused them before Israel, and smote them with a great slaughter at Gibeon,—and chased them along the way that goeth up Beth-horon, and smote them as far as Azekah and as far as Makkedah.

content: 11 And it came to pass､ when they fled from before Israel, they being on the slope of Beth-horon, that Yahweh cast down upon them great stones out of the heavens､ as far as Azekah､ and they died,—more were they who died by the hailstones, than they whom the sons of Israel slew with the sword.
content_old: 11 And it came to pass､ when they fled from before Israel, they being on the slope of Beth-horon, that Yahweh cast down upon them great stones out of the heavens､ as far as Azekah､ and they died,—more were they who died by the hailstones, than they whom the sons of Israel slew with the sword.

content: 12 Then spake Joshua unto Yahweh, on the day when Yahweh delivered up the Amorites before the sons of Israel,—yea he said､ in the presence of Israel— Thou Sun! in Gibeon be still､ And thou Moon! in the vale of Aijalon.
content_old: 12 Then spake Joshua unto Yahweh, on the day when Yahweh delivered up the Amorites before the sons of Israel,—yea he said､ in the presence of Israel— Thou Sun! in Gibeon be still､ And thou Moon! in the vale of Aijalon.

content: 13 So the sun was still and the moon stayed､ until a nation should be avenged on its foes. Is not that written in the Book of the Upright? So then the sun stayed in the middle of the heavens, and hastened not to go in､ about a whole day.
content_old: 13 So the sun was still and the moon stayed､ until a nation should be avenged on its foes. Is not that written in the Book of the Upright? So then the sun stayed in the middle of the heavens, and hastened not to go in､ about a whole day.

content: 14 And there was no day like that—before it or after it, when Yahweh hearkened unto the voice of a man,—in that Yahweh himself fought for Israel.
content_old: 14 And there was no day like that—before it or after it, when Yahweh hearkened unto the voice of a man,—in that Yahweh himself fought for Israel.

content: 15 So Joshua returned､ and all Israel with him, unto the camp at Gilgal.
content_old: 15 So Joshua returned､ and all Israel with him, unto the camp at Gilgal.

content: 16 So these five kings fled,—and hid themselves in a cave､ at Makkedah.
content_old: 16 So these five kings fled,—and hid themselves in a cave､ at Makkedah.

content: 17 And it was told Joshua､ saying,— The five kings are found, hid in a cave at Makkedah.
content_old: 17 And it was told Joshua､ saying,— The five kings are found, hid in a cave at Makkedah.

content: 18 And Joshua said, Roll ye great stones against the mouth of the cave,—and set over it men､ to watch them;
content_old: 18 And Joshua said, Roll ye great stones against the mouth of the cave,—and set over it men､ to watch them;

content: 19 but do not ye stay, chase after your enemies, so shall ye attack them in the rear,—do not suffer them to enter into their cities, for Yahweh your God hath delivered them into your hand.
content_old: 19 but do not ye stay, chase after your enemies, so shall ye attack them in the rear,—do not suffer them to enter into their cities, for Yahweh your God hath delivered them into your hand.

content: 20 And it came to pass when Joshua and the sons of Israel had made an end of smiting them with a very great slaughter､ until they were spent then did the remainder that were left of them enter into the fortified cities.
content_old: 20 And it came to pass when Joshua and the sons of Israel had made an end of smiting them with a very great slaughter､ until they were spent then did the remainder that were left of them enter into the fortified cities.

content: 21 And all the people returned unto the camp､ unto Joshua at Makkedah､ in peace,—none sharpened his tongue at any man of the sons of Israel.
content_old: 21 And all the people returned unto the camp､ unto Joshua at Makkedah､ in peace,—none sharpened his tongue at any man of the sons of Israel.

content: 22 Then said Joshua, Open ye the mouth of the cave,—and bring out unto me､ these five kings､ out of the cave.
content_old: 22 Then said Joshua, Open ye the mouth of the cave,—and bring out unto me､ these five kings､ out of the cave.

content: 23 And they did so, and brought out unto him､ these five kings�� out of the cave,—namely､ the king of Jerusalem､ the king of Hebron､ the king of Jarmuth. the king of Lachish､ the king of Eglon.
content_old: 23 And they did so, and brought out unto him､ these five kings�� out of the cave,—namely､ the king of Jerusalem､ the king of Hebron､ the king of Jarmuth. the king of Lachish､ the king of Eglon.

content: 24 And it came to pass when they brought out these kings unto Joshua that Joshua called for all the men of Israel､ and said unto the captains of the men of war who had been with him, Come near､ put your feet upon the necks of these kings. So they came near, and put their feet upon the necks of them.
content_old: 24 And it came to pass when they brought out these kings unto Joshua that Joshua called for all the men of Israel､ and said unto the captains of the men of war who had been with him, Come near､ put your feet upon the necks of these kings. So they came near, and put their feet upon the necks of them.

content: 25 Then said Joshua unto them: Do not fear､ nor be alarmed,—be firm and bold, for thus and thus will Yahweh do unto all your enemies, against whom ye do fight.
content_old: 25 Then said Joshua unto them: Do not fear､ nor be alarmed,—be firm and bold, for thus and thus will Yahweh do unto all your enemies, against whom ye do fight.

content: 26 And Joshua smote them after this､ and put them to death, and hanged them upon five trees,—and they remained hung on the trees､ until the evening.
content_old: 26 And Joshua smote them after this､ and put them to death, and hanged them upon five trees,—and they remained hung on the trees､ until the evening.

content: 27 And it came to pass at the time of the going in of the sun that Joshua gave command､ and they took them down off the trees, and cast them into the cave､ where they had hid themselves,—and put great stones upon the mouth of the cave, which remain until this very day.
content_old: 27 And it came to pass at the time of the going in of the sun that Joshua gave command､ and they took them down off the trees, and cast them into the cave､ where they had hid themselves,—and put great stones upon the mouth of the cave, which remain until this very day.

content: 28 And Joshua captured Makkedah on that day､ and smote it with the edge of the sword, and the king thereof devoted he to destruction, them and all the souls that were therein, he left no survivor,—but did unto the king of Makkedah, as he had done unto the king of Jericho.
content_old: 28 And Joshua captured Makkedah on that day､ and smote it with the edge of the sword, and the king thereof devoted he to destruction, them and all the souls that were therein, he left no survivor,—but did unto the king of Makkedah, as he had done unto the king of Jericho.

content: 29 And Joshua passed over､ and all Israel with him､ from Makkedah unto Libnah,—and fought against Libnah;
content_old: 29 And Joshua passed over､ and all Israel with him､ from Makkedah unto Libnah,—and fought against Libnah;

content: 30 and Yahweh delivered it also into the hand of Israel､ with the king thereof, and he smote it with the edge of the sword､ with all the souls that were therein, he left therein no survivor,—but did unto the king thereof, as he had done unto the king of Jericho.
content_old: 30 and Yahweh delivered it also into the hand of Israel､ with the king thereof, and he smote it with the edge of the sword､ with all the souls that were therein, he left therein no survivor,—but did unto the king thereof, as he had done unto the king of Jericho.

content: 31 And Joshua passed over､ and all Israel with him､ from Libnah unto Lachish,—and encamped against it, and fought against it;
content_old: 31 And Joshua passed over､ and all Israel with him､ from Libnah unto Lachish,—and encamped against it, and fought against it;

content: 32 and Yahweh delivered Lachish into the hand of Israel､ and he captured it on the second day, and smote it with the edge of the sword, with all the souls that were therein,—according to all that he had done unto Libnah.
content_old: 32 and Yahweh delivered Lachish into the hand of Israel､ and he captured it on the second day, and smote it with the edge of the sword, with all the souls that were therein,—according to all that he had done unto Libnah.

content: 33 Then came up Horam､ king of Gezer, to help Lachish,—and Joshua smote him and his people, until he had not left him a survivor.
content_old: 33 Then came up Horam､ king of Gezer, to help Lachish,—and Joshua smote him and his people, until he had not left him a survivor.

content: 34 And Joshua passed over､ and all Israel with him､ from Lachish unto Eglon,—and they encamped against it, and fought against it;
content_old: 34 And Joshua passed over､ and all Israel with him､ from Lachish unto Eglon,—and they encamped against it, and fought against it;

content: 35 and captured it on the same day､ and smote it with the edge of the sword, and all the souls that were therein､ on that day devoted he to destruction,—according to all that he had done to Lachish.
content_old: 35 and captured it on the same day､ and smote it with the edge of the sword, and all the souls that were therein､ on that day devoted he to destruction,—according to all that he had done to Lachish.

content: 36 And Joshua went up､ and all Israel with him､ from Eglon unto Hebron,—and they fought against it;
content_old: 36 And Joshua went up､ and all Israel with him､ from Eglon unto Hebron,—and they fought against it;

content: 37 and captured it､ and smote it with the edge of the sword､ and the king thereof､ and all the cities thereof､ with all the souls that were therein—he left not a survivor, according to all that he had done to Eglon,—he devoted it to destruction, and all the souls that were therein.
content_old: 37 and captured it､ and smote it with the edge of the sword､ and the king thereof､ and all the cities thereof､ with all the souls that were therein—he left not a survivor, according to all that he had done to Eglon,—he devoted it to destruction, and all the souls that were therein.

content: 38 Then Joshua turned back､ and all Israel with him､ unto Debir,—and fought against it;
content_old: 38 Then Joshua turned back､ and all Israel with him､ unto Debir,—and fought against it;

content: 39 and captured it､ and the king thereof､ and all the cities thereof､ and smote them with the edge of the sword, and devoted to destruction every soul that was therein, he left not a survivor,—as he had done unto Hebron so did he unto Debir､ and unto the king thereof, as also he had done unto Libnah､ and unto her king.
content_old: 39 and captured it､ and the king thereof､ and all the cities thereof､ and smote them with the edge of the sword, and devoted to destruction every soul that was therein, he left not a survivor,—as he had done unto Hebron so did he unto Debir､ and unto the king thereof, as also he had done unto Libnah､ and unto her king.

content: 40 So Joshua smote all the land—the hill country､ and the south､ and the lowland､ and the slopes､ and all their kings, he left not a survivor,—but every breathing thing devoted he to destruction, as Yahweh､ God of Israel､ had commanded.
content_old: 40 So Joshua smote all the land—the hill country､ and the south､ and the lowland､ and the slopes､ and all their kings, he left not a survivor,—but every breathing thing devoted he to destruction, as Yahweh､ God of Israel､ had commanded.

content: 41 Yea Joshua smote them､ from Kadesh-barnea､ even as far as Gaza,—and all the land of Goshen､ even as far as Gibeon.
content_old: 41 Yea Joshua smote them､ from Kadesh-barnea､ even as far as Gaza,—and all the land of Goshen､ even as far as Gibeon.

content: 42 Yea all these kings and their land did Joshua capture at one time,—because Yahweh､ God of Israel fought for Israel.
content_old: 42 Yea all these kings and their land did Joshua capture at one time,—because Yahweh､ God of Israel fought for Israel.

content: 1 And it came to pass when Jabin king of Hazor heard that he sent unto Jobab kin of Mâdôn, and unto the king of Shimron､ and unto the king of Achshaph;
content_old: 1 And it came to pass when Jabin king of Hazor heard that he sent unto Jobab kin of Mâdôn, and unto the king of Shimron､ and unto the king of Achshaph;

content: 2 and unto the kings who were on the north in the hill country and in the waste plain south of Chinneroth､ and in the lowland,—and in the heights of Dor､ on the west:
content_old: 2 and unto the kings who were on the north in the hill country and in the waste plain south of Chinneroth､ and in the lowland,—and in the heights of Dor､ on the west:

content: 3 the Canaanite on the east and on the west, and the Amorite､ and the Hittite､ and the Perizzite and the Jebusite､ in the hill country,—and the Hivite､ under Hermon, in the land of Mizpah;
content_old: 3 the Canaanite on the east and on the west, and the Amorite､ and the Hittite､ and the Perizzite and the Jebusite､ in the hill country,—and the Hivite､ under Hermon, in the land of Mizpah;

content: 4 and they came out—they､ and all their hosts with them, much people､ like the sand that is upon the seashore for multitude,—with horses and chariots very many.
content_old: 4 and they came out—they､ and all their hosts with them, much people､ like the sand that is upon the seashore for multitude,—with horses and chariots very many.

content: 5 And when all these kings were gathered together they came in､ and encamped as one man､ at the waters of Merom to fight with Israel.
content_old: 5 And when all these kings were gathered together they came in､ and encamped as one man､ at the waters of Merom to fight with Israel.

content: 6 Then said Yahweh unto Joshua— Do not fear because of them, for to-morrow､ about this time am I going to deliver up all of them､ slain､ before Israel,—their horses shalt thou ham-string, and their chariots shalt thou burn up with fire.
content_old: 6 Then said Yahweh unto Joshua— Do not fear because of them, for to-morrow､ about this time am I going to deliver up all of them､ slain､ before Israel,—their horses shalt thou ham-string, and their chariots shalt thou burn up with fire.

content: 7 So Joshua､ and all the army with him､ came in upon them､ by the waters of Merom､ suddenly, and fell upon them.
content_old: 7 So Joshua､ and all the army with him､ came in upon them､ by the waters of Merom､ suddenly, and fell upon them.

content: 8 And Yahweh delivered them up into the hand of Israel､ and they smote them, and chased them as far as great Zidon､ and as far as Misrephoth-maim, and as far as the valley of Mizpeh､ eastward,—yea they smote them until they left them not a survivor.
content_old: 8 And Yahweh delivered them up into the hand of Israel､ and they smote them, and chased them as far as great Zidon､ and as far as Misrephoth-maim, and as far as the valley of Mizpeh､ eastward,—yea they smote them until they left them not a survivor.

content: 9 And Joshua did unto them, as Yahweh had said unto him,—their horses he ham-strung, and their chariots burned he up with fire.
content_old: 9 And Joshua did unto them, as Yahweh had said unto him,—their horses he ham-strung, and their chariots burned he up with fire.

content: 10 Then Joshua turned back､ at that time､ and captured Hazor､ and the king thereof smote he with the sword,—for Hazor､ aforetime was the head of all these kingdoms.
content_old: 10 Then Joshua turned back､ at that time､ and captured Hazor､ and the king thereof smote he with the sword,—for Hazor､ aforetime was the head of all these kingdoms.

content: 11 And they smote all the souls that were therein､ with the edge of the sword､ devoting them to destruction, there was left no breathing thing,—and Hazor burned he up with fire.
content_old: 11 And they smote all the souls that were therein､ with the edge of the sword､ devoting them to destruction, there was left no breathing thing,—and Hazor burned he up with fire.

content: 12 And all the cities of these kings､ and all the kings thereof did Joshua capture､ and he smote them with the edge of the sword､ devoting them to destruction,—as Moses､ the servant of Yahweh､ commanded.
content_old: 12 And all the cities of these kings､ and all the kings thereof did Joshua capture､ and he smote them with the edge of the sword､ devoting them to destruction,—as Moses､ the servant of Yahweh､ commanded.

content: 13 Yet none of the cities that were still standing upon their mound did Israel burn none but Hazor alone did Joshua burn.
content_old: 13 Yet none of the cities that were still standing upon their mound did Israel burn none but Hazor alone did Joshua burn.

content: 14 But all the spoil of these cities､ and the cattle did the sons of Israel take as their prey,—nevertheless all the human beings smote they with the edge of the sword､ until they had destroyed them, they left remaining no breathing thing.
content_old: 14 But all the spoil of these cities､ and the cattle did the sons of Israel take as their prey,—nevertheless all the human beings smote they with the edge of the sword､ until they had destroyed them, they left remaining no breathing thing.

content: 15 As Yahweh commanded Moses his servant so Moses commanded Joshua, and so Joshua did, he set aside nothing of all that Yahweh commanded Moses.
content_old: 15 As Yahweh commanded Moses his servant so Moses commanded Joshua, and so Joshua did, he set aside nothing of all that Yahweh commanded Moses.

content: 16 So Joshua took all this land—the hill country､ and all the south､ and all the land of Goshen, and the lowland､ and the waste plain,—and the hill country of Israel､ and the lowland thereof:
content_old: 16 So Joshua took all this land—the hill country､ and all the south､ and all the land of Goshen, and the lowland､ and the waste plain,—and the hill country of Israel､ and the lowland thereof:

content: 17 from Mount Halak､ that goeth up to Seir, even as far as Baal-gad, in the valley of the Lebanon, under Mount Hermon,—and all their kings he captured, and smote them､ and put them to death.
content_old: 17 from Mount Halak､ that goeth up to Seir, even as far as Baal-gad, in the valley of the Lebanon, under Mount Hermon,—and all their kings he captured, and smote them､ and put them to death.

content: 18 Many days did Joshua with all these kings make war.
content_old: 18 Many days did Joshua with all these kings make war.

content: 19 There was not a city that made peace with the sons of Israel, save the Hivites dwelling in Gibeon,—the whole took they in battle.
content_old: 19 There was not a city that made peace with the sons of Israel, save the Hivites dwelling in Gibeon,—the whole took they in battle.

content: 20 For from Yahweh came it to pass､ that their heart was emboldened to come out to war with Israel､ that he might devote them to destruction, that they might find no favour,—but that he might destroy them,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.
content_old: 20 For from Yahweh came it to pass､ that their heart was emboldened to come out to war with Israel､ that he might devote them to destruction, that they might find no favour,—but that he might destroy them,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.

content: 21 And Joshua came in､ at that time､ and cut off the Anakim from the hill country—from Hebron､ from Debir､ from Anab, and from all the hill country of Judah, and from all the hill country of Israel,—with their cities did Joshua devote them to destruction.
content_old: 21 And Joshua came in､ at that time､ and cut off the Anakim from the hill country—from Hebron､ from Debir､ from Anab, and from all the hill country of Judah, and from all the hill country of Israel,—with their cities did Joshua devote them to destruction.

content: 22 There was left remaining none of the Anakim, in the land of the sons of Israel,—save only in Gaza, in Gath, and in Ashdod did some remain.
content_old: 22 There was left remaining none of the Anakim, in the land of the sons of Israel,—save only in Gaza, in Gath, and in Ashdod did some remain.

content: 1 Now these are the kings of the land､ whom the sons of Israel had smitten､ and of whose land they had taken possession, over the Jordan､ towards the rising of the sun,—from the ravine of Arnon as far as Mount Hermon, and all the waste plain､ on the east:
content_old: 1 Now these are the kings of the land､ whom the sons of Israel had smitten､ and of whose land they had taken possession, over the Jordan､ towards the rising of the sun,—from the ravine of Arnon as far as Mount Hermon, and all the waste plain､ on the east:

content: 2 Sihon､ king of the Amorites, who dwelt in Heshbon,—ruling from Aroer､ which is on the edge of the ravine of Arnon､ and the middle of the ravine､ and half Gilead, even as far as the ravine Jabbok, the boundary of the sons of Ammon;
content_old: 2 Sihon､ king of the Amorites, who dwelt in Heshbon,—ruling from Aroer､ which is on the edge of the ravine of Arnon､ and the middle of the ravine､ and half Gilead, even as far as the ravine Jabbok, the boundary of the sons of Ammon;

content: 3 and the waste plain as far as the sea of Chinneroth､ on the east､ even as far as the sea of the waste plain､ the salt sea､ on the east, the way to Beth-jeshimoth,—and､ on the south､ under the slopes of Pisgah;
content_old: 3 and the waste plain as far as the sea of Chinneroth､ on the east､ even as far as the sea of the waste plain､ the salt sea､ on the east, the way to Beth-jeshimoth,—and､ on the south､ under the slopes of Pisgah;

content: 4 and the boundary of Og, king of Bashan, of the remnant of the giants,—him who dwelt in Ashtaroth and in Edrei;
content_old: 4 and the boundary of Og, king of Bashan, of the remnant of the giants,—him who dwelt in Ashtaroth and in Edrei;

content: 5 ruling also in Mount Hermon､ and in Salecah､ and in all Bashan, as far as the boundary of the Geshurites､ and the Maacathites,—and half Gilead, the boundary of Sihon king of Heshbon:—
content_old: 5 ruling also in Mount Hermon､ and in Salecah､ and in all Bashan, as far as the boundary of the Geshurites､ and the Maacathites,—and half Gilead, the boundary of Sihon king of Heshbon:—

content: 6 Moses the servant of Yahweh､ and the sons of Israel had smitten them,—and Moses the servant of Yahweh､ had given it､ as a possession､ unto the Reubenites､ and unto the Gadites, and unto the half tribe of Manasseh.
content_old: 6 Moses the servant of Yahweh､ and the sons of Israel had smitten them,—and Moses the servant of Yahweh､ had given it､ as a possession､ unto the Reubenites､ and unto the Gadites, and unto the half tribe of Manasseh.

content: 7 And these are the kings of the land､ whom Joshua and the sons of Israel smote over the Jordan､ towards the west, from Baal-gad in the valley of the Lebanon, even as far as the Mount Halak that goeth up towards Seir,—and Joshua gave it unto the tribes of Israel､ as a possession､ according to their portions;
content_old: 7 And these are the kings of the land､ whom Joshua and the sons of Israel smote over the Jordan､ towards the west, from Baal-gad in the valley of the Lebanon, even as far as the Mount Halak that goeth up towards Seir,—and Joshua gave it unto the tribes of Israel､ as a possession､ according to their portions;

content: 8 in the hill country and in the lowland､ and in the waste plain､ and in the slopes, and in the desert､ and in the south,—the Hittite､ the Amorite､ and the Canaanite, the Perizzite､ the Hivite､ and the Jebusite:—
content_old: 8 in the hill country and in the lowland､ and in the waste plain､ and in the slopes, and in the desert､ and in the south,—the Hittite､ the Amorite､ and the Canaanite, the Perizzite､ the Hivite､ and the Jebusite:—

content: 1 Now Joshua was old, advanced in days,—so then Yahweh said unto him— Thou art old､ advanced in days, and much the larger part of the land remaineth to be possessed.
content_old: 1 Now Joshua was old, advanced in days,—so then Yahweh said unto him— Thou art old､ advanced in days, and much the larger part of the land remaineth to be possessed.

content: 2 This is the land that remaineth,—all the regions of the Philistines､ and all the Geshuri;
content_old: 2 This is the land that remaineth,—all the regions of the Philistines､ and all the Geshuri;

content: 3 from the Shihor which faceth Egypt､ even as far as the boundary of Ekron､ northward, to the Canaanites is it counted,—five princes of Philistines—the Gazites､ and the Ashdodites､ the Ashkalonites､ the Gittites, and the Ekronites, also the Avvim
content_old: 3 from the Shihor which faceth Egypt､ even as far as the boundary of Ekron､ northward, to the Canaanites is it counted,—five princes of Philistines—the Gazites､ and the Ashdodites､ the Ashkalonites､ the Gittites, and the Ekronites, also the Avvim

content: 4 on the south: all the land of the Canaanites､ and Mearah which belongeth to the Zidonians､ as far as Aphek,—as far as the boundary of the Amorites;
content_old: 4 on the south: all the land of the Canaanites､ and Mearah which belongeth to the Zidonians､ as far as Aphek,—as far as the boundary of the Amorites;

content: 5 and the land of the Gebalites､ and all the Lebanon､ to the rising of the sun, from Baal-gad, under Mount Hermon,—as far as the entering in of Hamath:
content_old: 5 and the land of the Gebalites､ and all the Lebanon､ to the rising of the sun, from Baal-gad, under Mount Hermon,—as far as the entering in of Hamath:

content: 6 all the inhabitants of the hill country､ from the Lebanon as far as Misrephoth-maim—all the Zidonians､ I myself will dispossess them from before the sons of Israel,—nevertheless､ assign thou it by lot unto Israel､ for an inheritance､ as I have commanded thee.
content_old: 6 all the inhabitants of the hill country､ from the Lebanon as far as Misrephoth-maim—all the Zidonians､ I myself will dispossess them from before the sons of Israel,—nevertheless､ assign thou it by lot unto Israel､ for an inheritance､ as I have commanded thee.

content: 7 Now therefore､ apportion this land as an inheritance､ unto the nine tribes,—and the half tribe of Manasseh.
content_old: 7 Now therefore､ apportion this land as an inheritance､ unto the nine tribes,—and the half tribe of Manasseh.

content: 8 With them the Reubenites and the Gadites received their inheritance,—which Moses gave them beyond the Jordan､ eastward, as Moses the servant of Yahweh gave unto them:
content_old: 8 With them the Reubenites and the Gadites received their inheritance,—which Moses gave them beyond the Jordan､ eastward, as Moses the servant of Yahweh gave unto them:

content: 9 from Aroer､ which is on the edge of the ravine of Arnon､ and the city､ which is in the midst of the ravine､ and all the table-land of Medeba､ as far as Dibon;
content_old: 9 from Aroer､ which is on the edge of the ravine of Arnon､ and the city､ which is in the midst of the ravine､ and all the table-land of Medeba､ as far as Dibon;

content: 10 and all the cities of Sihon､ king of the Amorites, who reigned in Heshbon,—as far as the boundary of the sons of Ammon;
content_old: 10 and all the cities of Sihon､ king of the Amorites, who reigned in Heshbon,—as far as the boundary of the sons of Ammon;

content: 11 and Gilead､ and the boundary of the Geshurites and the Maacathites､ and all Mount Hermon､ and all Bashan､ as far as Salecah;
content_old: 11 and Gilead､ and the boundary of the Geshurites and the Maacathites､ and all Mount Hermon､ and all Bashan､ as far as Salecah;

content: 12 all the kingdom of Og in Bashan, who reigned in Ashtaroth and in Edrei,—he being left of the remnant of the giants; and Moses smote them and dispossessed them;
content_old: 12 all the kingdom of Og in Bashan, who reigned in Ashtaroth and in Edrei,—he being left of the remnant of the giants; and Moses smote them and dispossessed them;

content: 13 the sons of Israel, however, did not dispossess the Geshurites or the Maacathites,—but Geshur and Maacath have remained in the midst of Israel until this day.
content_old: 13 the sons of Israel, however, did not dispossess the Geshurites or the Maacathites,—but Geshur and Maacath have remained in the midst of Israel until this day.

content: 14 Howbeit unto the tribe of Levi gave he no inheritance,—the altar-flames of Yahweh God of Israel are his inheritance, as he spake unto him.
content_old: 14 Howbeit unto the tribe of Levi gave he no inheritance,—the altar-flames of Yahweh God of Israel are his inheritance, as he spake unto him.

content: 15 Thus then Moses gave an inheritance unto the tribe of the sons of Reuben by their families;
content_old: 15 Thus then Moses gave an inheritance unto the tribe of the sons of Reuben by their families;

content: 16 and their boundary was from Aroer､ that is on the edge of the ravine of Arnon and the city which is in the midst of the ravine and all the table-land by Medeba;
content_old: 16 and their boundary was from Aroer､ that is on the edge of the ravine of Arnon and the city which is in the midst of the ravine and all the table-land by Medeba;

content: 17 Heshbon and all her cities which are on the table-land,—Dibon and Bamoth-baal, and Beth-baal-meon;
content_old: 17 Heshbon and all her cities which are on the table-land,—Dibon and Bamoth-baal, and Beth-baal-meon;

content: 18 and Jahaz and Kedemoth and Maphâath;
content_old: 18 and Jahaz and Kedemoth and Maphâath;

content: 19 and Kiriathaim and Sibmah, and Zareth-shahar on the mount of the vale;
content_old: 19 and Kiriathaim and Sibmah, and Zareth-shahar on the mount of the vale;

content: 20 and Beth-peor､ and the slopes of Pisgah､ and Beth-jeshimoth;
content_old: 20 and Beth-peor､ and the slopes of Pisgah､ and Beth-jeshimoth;

content: 21 and all the cities of the table-land, and all the kingdom of Sihon king of the Amorites, who reigned in Heshbon,—whom Moses smote—with the princes of Midian Evi and Rekem and Zur and Hur and Reba, dukes of Sihon dwelling in the land;
content_old: 21 and all the cities of the table-land, and all the kingdom of Sihon king of the Amorites, who reigned in Heshbon,—whom Moses smote—with the princes of Midian Evi and Rekem and Zur and Hur and Reba, dukes of Sihon dwelling in the land;

content: 22 Balaam also son of Beor, the diviner did the sons of Israel slay with the sword among their slain.
content_old: 22 Balaam also son of Beor, the diviner did the sons of Israel slay with the sword among their slain.

content: 23 And so the boundary of the sons of Reuben was the Jordan and district. This is the inheritance of the sons of Reuben by their families, the cities and the villages thereof.
content_old: 23 And so the boundary of the sons of Reuben was the Jordan and district. This is the inheritance of the sons of Reuben by their families, the cities and the villages thereof.

content: 24 And Moses gave an inheritance unto the tribe of Gad, unto the sons of Gad by their families;
content_old: 24 And Moses gave an inheritance unto the tribe of Gad, unto the sons of Gad by their families;

content: 25 and their boundary was—Jazer､ and all the cities of Gilead, and half the land of the sons of Ammon,—as far as Aroer､ which faceth Rabbah;
content_old: 25 and their boundary was—Jazer､ and all the cities of Gilead, and half the land of the sons of Ammon,—as far as Aroer､ which faceth Rabbah;

content: 26 and from Heshbon as far as Ramath-mizpeh､ and Botonim,—and from Mahanaim as far as the boundary of Debir;
content_old: 26 and from Heshbon as far as Ramath-mizpeh､ and Botonim,—and from Mahanaim as far as the boundary of Debir;

content: 27 and in the valley—Beth-haram and Beth-nimrah and Succoth and Zaphon the rest of the kingdom of Sihon king of Heshbon, the Jordan and district,—as far as the end of the sea of Chinnereth, beyond the Jordan eastward.
content_old: 27 and in the valley—Beth-haram and Beth-nimrah and Succoth and Zaphon the rest of the kingdom of Sihon king of Heshbon, the Jordan and district,—as far as the end of the sea of Chinnereth, beyond the Jordan eastward.

content: 28 This is the inheritance of the sons of Gad､ by their families,—the cities and the villages thereof.
content_old: 28 This is the inheritance of the sons of Gad､ by their families,—the cities and the villages thereof.

content: 29 And Moses gave an inheritance unto the half tribe of Manasseh,—so it belonged to the half tribe of the sons of Manasseh by their families;
content_old: 29 And Moses gave an inheritance unto the half tribe of Manasseh,—so it belonged to the half tribe of the sons of Manasseh by their families;

content: 30 and their boundary was—from Mahanaim all Bashan all the kingdom of Og king of Bashan and all the Encampments of Jair which are in Bashan three-score cities;
content_old: 30 and their boundary was—from Mahanaim all Bashan all the kingdom of Og king of Bashan and all the Encampments of Jair which are in Bashan three-score cities;

content: 31 and half Gilead and Ashtaroth and Edrei, cities of the kingdom of Og in Bashan pertained to the sons of Machir son of Manasseh, to half the sons of Machir by their families.
content_old: 31 and half Gilead and Ashtaroth and Edrei, cities of the kingdom of Og in Bashan pertained to the sons of Machir son of Manasseh, to half the sons of Machir by their families.

content: 32 These are the portions which Moses gave for inheritance, in the waste plains of Moab,—over the Jordan by Jericho eastward.
content_old: 32 These are the portions which Moses gave for inheritance, in the waste plains of Moab,—over the Jordan by Jericho eastward.

content: 1 And these are the inheritances which the sons of Israel received in the land of Canaan,—which Eleazar the priest, and Joshua the son of Nun, and the ancestral heads of the tribes of the sons of Israel gave them to inherit.
content_old: 1 And these are the inheritances which the sons of Israel received in the land of Canaan,—which Eleazar the priest, and Joshua the son of Nun, and the ancestral heads of the tribes of the sons of Israel gave them to inherit.

content: 2 By lot was their inheritance divided,—as Yahweh commanded by the hand of Moses, unto the nine tribes and unto the half tribe.
content_old: 2 By lot was their inheritance divided,—as Yahweh commanded by the hand of Moses, unto the nine tribes and unto the half tribe.

content: 3 For Moses had given the two tribes and the half tribe their inheritance over the Jordan,—but unto the Levites gave he no inheritance in their midst;
content_old: 3 For Moses had given the two tribes and the half tribe their inheritance over the Jordan,—but unto the Levites gave he no inheritance in their midst;

content: 4 for the sons of Joseph became two tribes Manasseh and Ephraim,—so they gave no portion to the Levites in the land､ save only cities to dwell in, with the pasture lands thereof, for their cattle and for their substance.
content_old: 4 for the sons of Joseph became two tribes Manasseh and Ephraim,—so they gave no portion to the Levites in the land､ save only cities to dwell in, with the pasture lands thereof, for their cattle and for their substance.

content: 5 As Yahweh commanded Moses so did the sons of Israel,—when they apportioned the land.
content_old: 5 As Yahweh commanded Moses so did the sons of Israel,—when they apportioned the land.

content: 6 Then came near the sons of Judah unto Joshua in Gilgal, and Caleb the son of Jephunneh､ the Kenizzite､ said unto him,— Thou knowest the word which Yahweh spake unto Moses the man of God in my behalf and in thine in Kadesh-barnea.
content_old: 6 Then came near the sons of Judah unto Joshua in Gilgal, and Caleb the son of Jephunneh､ the Kenizzite､ said unto him,— Thou knowest the word which Yahweh spake unto Moses the man of God in my behalf and in thine in Kadesh-barnea.

content: 7 Forty years old was I when Moses the servant of Yahweh sent me from Kadesh-barnea to spy out the land,—so I brought him back word, as was in my heart.
content_old: 7 Forty years old was I when Moses the servant of Yahweh sent me from Kadesh-barnea to spy out the land,—so I brought him back word, as was in my heart.

content: 8 But my brethren who had been up with me made the heart of the people melt,—whereas I wholly followed Yahweh my God.
content_old: 8 But my brethren who had been up with me made the heart of the people melt,—whereas I wholly followed Yahweh my God.

content: 9 So then Moses sware on that day saying, Surely the land on which thy foot hath trodden unto thee shall belong､ for an inheritance and unto thy sons, unto times age-abiding,—because thou hast wholly followed Yahweh my God.
content_old: 9 So then Moses sware on that day saying, Surely the land on which thy foot hath trodden unto thee shall belong､ for an inheritance and unto thy sons, unto times age-abiding,—because thou hast wholly followed Yahweh my God.

content: 10 Now therefore lo! Yahweh hath kept me alive as he spake these forty and five years from the time Yahweh spake this word unto Moses, while Israel journeyed in the desert. Now therefore lo! I—to-day am eighty and five years old:
content_old: 10 Now therefore lo! Yahweh hath kept me alive as he spake these forty and five years from the time Yahweh spake this word unto Moses, while Israel journeyed in the desert. Now therefore lo! I—to-day am eighty and five years old:

content: 11 I remain, to-day, as courageous as on the day when Moses sent me as my strength was then so also my strength is now,—for war､ both to go out and to come in.
content_old: 11 I remain, to-day, as courageous as on the day when Moses sent me as my strength was then so also my strength is now,—for war､ both to go out and to come in.

content: 12 Now therefore give me this mountain, whereof Yahweh spake､ on that day,—for thou thyself didst hear､ on that day､ that Anakim were there､ and great cities fortified, if so be Yahweh be with me then shall I dispossess them, As spake Yahweh.
content_old: 12 Now therefore give me this mountain, whereof Yahweh spake､ on that day,—for thou thyself didst hear､ on that day､ that Anakim were there､ and great cities fortified, if so be Yahweh be with me then shall I dispossess them, As spake Yahweh.

content: 13 So Joshua blessed him､ and gave Hebron unto Caleb son of Jephunneh､ for an inheritance.
content_old: 13 So Joshua blessed him､ and gave Hebron unto Caleb son of Jephunneh､ for an inheritance.

content: 14 For this cause hath Hebron belonged unto Caleb son of Jephunneh the Kenezzite､ for an inheritance､ unto this day,—because he wholly followed Yahweh､ God of Israel.
content_old: 14 For this cause hath Hebron belonged unto Caleb son of Jephunneh the Kenezzite､ for an inheritance､ unto this day,—because he wholly followed Yahweh､ God of Israel.

content: 1 So then the boundary of the tribe of the sons of Judah､ by their families,—reached unto the boundary of Edom､ the desert of Zin southward､ on the extreme south;
content_old: 1 So then the boundary of the tribe of the sons of Judah､ by their families,—reached unto the boundary of Edom､ the desert of Zin southward､ on the extreme south;

content: 2 so their south boundary beginneth at the end of the Salt Sea,—from the bay that turneth to the south;
content_old: 2 so their south boundary beginneth at the end of the Salt Sea,—from the bay that turneth to the south;

content: 3 and goeth forth on the south of the cliffs of Akrabbim､ and crosseth over to Zin, and goeth up on the south of Kadesh-barnea,—and passeth over by Hezron､ and goeth up to Addar, and turneth round to Karka;
content_old: 3 and goeth forth on the south of the cliffs of Akrabbim､ and crosseth over to Zin, and goeth up on the south of Kadesh-barnea,—and passeth over by Hezron､ and goeth up to Addar, and turneth round to Karka;

content: 4 and passeth over to Azmon､ and goeth forth at the ravine of Egypt, and so the extensions of the boundary are to the sea. This shall be your south boundary.
content_old: 4 and passeth over to Azmon､ and goeth forth at the ravine of Egypt, and so the extensions of the boundary are to the sea. This shall be your south boundary.

content: 5 And a boundary eastward is the Salt Sea, as far as the end of the Jordan. And the boundary on the north side is from the bay of the sea, from the end of the Jordan.
content_old: 5 And a boundary eastward is the Salt Sea, as far as the end of the Jordan. And the boundary on the north side is from the bay of the sea, from the end of the Jordan.

content: 6 And the boundary goeth up Beth-hoglah, and passeth over､ on the north､ by Beth-arabah,—and the boundary goeth up by the Stone of Bohan､ son of Reuben;
content_old: 6 And the boundary goeth up Beth-hoglah, and passeth over､ on the north､ by Beth-arabah,—and the boundary goeth up by the Stone of Bohan､ son of Reuben;

content: 7 and the boundary goeth up towards Debir､ out of the vale of Achor, then northward､ turning unto Gilgal､ which is over against the ascent of Adummim, which is on the south side of the ravine,—then the boundary passeth over unto the waters of En-shemesh, and so the extensions thereof are unto En-rogel:
content_old: 7 and the boundary goeth up towards Debir､ out of the vale of Achor, then northward､ turning unto Gilgal､ which is over against the ascent of Adummim, which is on the south side of the ravine,—then the boundary passeth over unto the waters of En-shemesh, and so the extensions thereof are unto En-rogel:

content: 8 then ascendeth the boundary by the valley of the son of Hinnom､ to the side of the Jebusite､ on the south, the same is Jerusalem,—and the boundary goeth up unto the top of the mountain which faceth the valley of Hinnom､ to the west, which is at the end of the Vale of Giants､ northwards;
content_old: 8 then ascendeth the boundary by the valley of the son of Hinnom､ to the side of the Jebusite､ on the south, the same is Jerusalem,—and the boundary goeth up unto the top of the mountain which faceth the valley of Hinnom､ to the west, which is at the end of the Vale of Giants､ northwards;

content: 9 and the boundary turneth round､ from the top of the mountain､ unto the fountain of the waters of Nephtoah, and goeth out unto the cities of Mount Ephron,—then the boundary turneth round to Baalah, the same is Kiriath-jearim;
content_old: 9 and the boundary turneth round､ from the top of the mountain､ unto the fountain of the waters of Nephtoah, and goeth out unto the cities of Mount Ephron,—then the boundary turneth round to Baalah, the same is Kiriath-jearim;

content: 10 then the boundary goeth round from Baalah westward, unto Mount Seir, and passeth over unto the slope of Mount Yearim､ on the north､ the same is Chesalon,—and descendeth Beth-shemesh､ and passeth over Timnah;
content_old: 10 then the boundary goeth round from Baalah westward, unto Mount Seir, and passeth over unto the slope of Mount Yearim､ on the north､ the same is Chesalon,—and descendeth Beth-shemesh､ and passeth over Timnah;

content: 11 then the boundary goeth forth unto the side of Ekron､ northward, then the boundary turneth round towards Shikkeron, and crosseth over Mount Baalah､ and goeth out at Jabneel,—and the extensions of the boundary are to the sea.
content_old: 11 then the boundary goeth forth unto the side of Ekron､ northward, then the boundary turneth round towards Shikkeron, and crosseth over Mount Baalah､ and goeth out at Jabneel,—and the extensions of the boundary are to the sea.

content: 12 And as a west boundary are the great sea and coast. This is the boundary of the sons of Judah､ round about､ by their families.
content_old: 12 And as a west boundary are the great sea and coast. This is the boundary of the sons of Judah､ round about､ by their families.

content: 13 And to Caleb､ son of Jephunneh gave he a portion､ in the midst of the sons of Judah, at the bidding of Yahweh､ by Joshua,—even the City of Arba､ father of Anak､ the same is Hebron.
content_old: 13 And to Caleb､ son of Jephunneh gave he a portion､ in the midst of the sons of Judah, at the bidding of Yahweh､ by Joshua,—even the City of Arba､ father of Anak､ the same is Hebron.

content: 14 And Caleb dispossessed from thence､ the three sons of Anak,—Sheshai､ and Ahiman､ and Talmai, the descendants of Anak.
content_old: 14 And Caleb dispossessed from thence､ the three sons of Anak,—Sheshai､ and Ahiman､ and Talmai, the descendants of Anak.

content: 15 And he went up from thence, against the inhabitants of Debir,—now the name of Debir､ formerly was Kiriath-sepher.
content_old: 15 And he went up from thence, against the inhabitants of Debir,—now the name of Debir､ formerly was Kiriath-sepher.

content: 16 Then said Caleb, He that smiteth Kiriath-sepher､ and captureth it I will give unto him Achsah､ my daughter､ to wife.
content_old: 16 Then said Caleb, He that smiteth Kiriath-sepher､ and captureth it I will give unto him Achsah､ my daughter､ to wife.

content: 17 And Othniel son of Kenaz､ brother of Caleb captured it,—so he gave unto him Achsah､ his daughter､ to wife.
content_old: 17 And Othniel son of Kenaz､ brother of Caleb captured it,—so he gave unto him Achsah､ his daughter､ to wife.

content: 18 And it came to pass､ when she came that she moved him to ask of her father a field, and when she alighted from off the ass Caleb said unto her— What aileth thee?
content_old: 18 And it came to pass､ when she came that she moved him to ask of her father a field, and when she alighted from off the ass Caleb said unto her— What aileth thee?

content: 19 And she said— Give me a present､ for dry land hast thou given me, therefore must thou give me､ pools of water. So he gave her upper pools and lower pools.
content_old: 19 And she said— Give me a present､ for dry land hast thou given me, therefore must thou give me､ pools of water. So he gave her upper pools and lower pools.

content: 20 This is the inheritance of the tribe of the sons of Judah､ by their families.
content_old: 20 This is the inheritance of the tribe of the sons of Judah､ by their families.

content: 21 And the uttermost cities of the tribe of the sons of Judah, towards the boundary of Edom in the south, were,—Kabzeêl and Eder､ and Jagur,
content_old: 21 And the uttermost cities of the tribe of the sons of Judah, towards the boundary of Edom in the south, were,—Kabzeêl and Eder､ and Jagur,

content_old: 22 and Kinah and Dimonah､ and Adadah,—

content_old: 23 and Kedesh and Hazor､ and Ithnan,

content_old: 24 Ziph and Talem､ and Bealoth,

content_old: 25 and Hazor-hadattah and Kerioth-hezron､ the same is Hazor;

content_old: 46 From Ekron､ even unto the sea,—all that were by the side of Ashdod with their villages.

content: 47 Ashdod､ her towns and her villages. Gaza､ her towns and her villages､ as far as the ravine of Egypt,—and the great sea and coast.
content_old: 47 Ashdod､ her towns and her villages. Gaza､ her towns and her villages､ as far as the ravine of Egypt,—and the great sea and coast.

content: 1 Then came out the lot､ for the sons of Joseph, from the Jordan by Jericho, at the waters of Jericho､ eastward,—the desert､ going up from Jericho､ through the hill country to Bethel;
content_old: 1 Then came out the lot､ for the sons of Joseph, from the Jordan by Jericho, at the waters of Jericho､ eastward,—the desert､ going up from Jericho､ through the hill country to Bethel;

content: 2 and it goeth out from Bethel towards Luz,—and passeth over unto the boundary of the Archites at Ataroth;
content_old: 2 and it goeth out from Bethel towards Luz,—and passeth over unto the boundary of the Archites at Ataroth;

content: 3 and descendeth westward､ unto the boundary of the Japhletites､ as far as the boundary of Beth-horon the neither､ and as far as Gezer,—and the extensions thereof are to the sea.
content_old: 3 and descendeth westward､ unto the boundary of the Japhletites､ as far as the boundary of Beth-horon the neither､ and as far as Gezer,—and the extensions thereof are to the sea.

content: 4 So the sons of Joseph､ Manasseh and Ephraim､ received their inheritance.
content_old: 4 So the sons of Joseph､ Manasseh and Ephraim､ received their inheritance.

content: 5 And the boundary of the sons of Ephraim､ by their families､ was,—yea the boundary of their inheritance on the east､ was Ataroth-addar, as far as Beth-horon the upper;
content_old: 5 And the boundary of the sons of Ephraim､ by their families､ was,—yea the boundary of their inheritance on the east､ was Ataroth-addar, as far as Beth-horon the upper;

content: 6 and the boundary goeth out westward at Michmethath､ on the north, then the boundary bendeth round eastward､ to Taanath-shiloh,—and passeth by it on the east to Janoah;
content_old: 6 and the boundary goeth out westward at Michmethath､ on the north, then the boundary bendeth round eastward､ to Taanath-shiloh,—and passeth by it on the east to Janoah;

content: 7 and goeth down from Janoah to Ataroth and to Naarah,—and toucheth upon Jericho､ and goeth out at the Jordan.
content_old: 7 and goeth down from Janoah to Ataroth and to Naarah,—and toucheth upon Jericho､ and goeth out at the Jordan.

content: 8 From Tappuah runneth the boundary along westward､ to the ravine of Kanah, and the extensions thereof are to the sea,—this is the inheritance of the tribe of the sons of Ephraim､ by their families;
content_old: 8 From Tappuah runneth the boundary along westward､ to the ravine of Kanah, and the extensions thereof are to the sea,—this is the inheritance of the tribe of the sons of Ephraim､ by their families;

content: 9 together with the cities which were separated for the sons of Ephraim, in the midst of the inheritance of the sons of Manasseh,—all the cities, with their villages.
content_old: 9 together with the cities which were separated for the sons of Ephraim, in the midst of the inheritance of the sons of Manasseh,—all the cities, with their villages.

content: 1 And the lot for the tribe of Manasseh was, for he was the firstborn of Joseph,—as for Machir､ the firstborn of Manasseh､ the father of Gilead because he was a man of war therefore had he Gilead and Bashan.
content_old: 1 And the lot for the tribe of Manasseh was, for he was the firstborn of Joseph,—as for Machir､ the firstborn of Manasseh､ the father of Gilead because he was a man of war therefore had he Gilead and Bashan.

content: 2 So the lot pertained to the rest of the sons of Manasseh, by their families, to the sons of Abiezer､ and to the sons of Helek､ and to the sons of Asriel､ and to the sons of Shechem, and to the sons of Hepher､ and to the sons of Shemida,—these were the sons of Manasseh､ son of Joseph､ even the male descendants､ by their families.
content_old: 2 So the lot pertained to the rest of the sons of Manasseh, by their families, to the sons of Abiezer､ and to the sons of Helek､ and to the sons of Asriel､ and to the sons of Shechem, and to the sons of Hepher､ and to the sons of Shemida,—these were the sons of Manasseh､ son of Joseph､ even the male descendants､ by their families.

content: 3 But Zelophehad､ son of Hepher､ son of Gilead､ son of Machir､ son of Manasseh had no sons､ but only daughters,—and these are the names of his daughters, Mahlah and Noah, Hoglah､ Milcah､ and Tirzah.
content_old: 3 But Zelophehad､ son of Hepher､ son of Gilead､ son of Machir､ son of Manasseh had no sons､ but only daughters,—and these are the names of his daughters, Mahlah and Noah, Hoglah､ Milcah､ and Tirzah.

content: 4 And they had come near､ before Eleazar the priest､ and before Joshua son of Nun､ and before the princes､ saying, Yahweh commanded Moses, to give us an inheritance in the midst of our brethren,— And he had given them､ according to the bidding of Yahweh､ an inheritance, in the midst of the brethren of their father.
content_old: 4 And they had come near､ before Eleazar the priest､ and before Joshua son of Nun､ and before the princes､ saying, Yahweh commanded Moses, to give us an inheritance in the midst of our brethren,— And he had given them､ according to the bidding of Yahweh､ an inheritance, in the midst of the brethren of their father.

content: 5 Thus there fell ten portions to Manasseh,—besides the land of Gilead､ and Bashan, which is beyond the Jordan;
content_old: 5 Thus there fell ten portions to Manasseh,—besides the land of Gilead､ and Bashan, which is beyond the Jordan;

content: 6 because the daughters of Manasseh received an inheritance in the midst of his sons,—and the land of Gilead became the possession of the sons of Manasseh that remained.
content_old: 6 because the daughters of Manasseh received an inheritance in the midst of his sons,—and the land of Gilead became the possession of the sons of Manasseh that remained.

content: 7 So then the boundary of Manasseh was from Asher, Michmethath､ which faceth Shechem,—and the boundary goeth along unto the right hand､ unto the inhabitants of En-tappuah.
content_old: 7 So then the boundary of Manasseh was from Asher, Michmethath､ which faceth Shechem,—and the boundary goeth along unto the right hand､ unto the inhabitants of En-tappuah.

content: 8 Manasseh had the land of Tappuah,—but Tappuah itself towards the boundary of Manasseh､ pertained unto the sons of Ephraim;
content_old: 8 Manasseh had the land of Tappuah,—but Tappuah itself towards the boundary of Manasseh､ pertained unto the sons of Ephraim;

content: 9 and the boundary goeth down to the ravine of Kanah､ southward of the ravine､ these cities belong to Ephraim, in the midst of the cities of Manasseh,—but the boundary of Manasseh was on the north side of the ravine, and the extensions thereof were to the sea;
content_old: 9 and the boundary goeth down to the ravine of Kanah､ southward of the ravine､ these cities belong to Ephraim, in the midst of the cities of Manasseh,—but the boundary of Manasseh was on the north side of the ravine, and the extensions thereof were to the sea;

content: 10 southward pertaineth to Ephraim､ and northward to Manasseh, and the sea was the boundary thereof,—and they touch Asher on the north､ and Issachar on the east.
content_old: 10 southward pertaineth to Ephraim､ and northward to Manasseh, and the sea was the boundary thereof,—and they touch Asher on the north､ and Issachar on the east.

content: 11 And Manasseh had—in Issachar and in Asher—Bethshean and her towns､ and Ibleam and her towns､ and the inhabitants of Dor and her towns､ and the inhabitants of En-dor and her towns､ and the inhabitants of Taanach and her towns､ and the inhabitants of Megiddo､ and her towns—the three heights.
content_old: 11 And Manasseh had—in Issachar and in Asher—Bethshean and her towns､ and Ibleam and her towns､ and the inhabitants of Dor and her towns､ and the inhabitants of En-dor and her towns､ and the inhabitants of Taanach and her towns､ and the inhabitants of Megiddo､ and her towns—the three heights.

content: 12 The sons of Manasseh､ however､ could not dispossess these cities,—but the Canaanites were determined to remain in this land;
content_old: 12 The sons of Manasseh､ however､ could not dispossess these cities,—but the Canaanites were determined to remain in this land;

content: 13 but when the sons of Israel had waxed strong they put the Canaanites under tribute,—though they dispossessed them not.
content_old: 13 but when the sons of Israel had waxed strong they put the Canaanites under tribute,—though they dispossessed them not.

content: 14 Then spake the sons of Joseph unto Joshua､ saying,— Why hast thou given me､ as an inheritance､ but one lot and one portion, seeing that I am a numerous people, because hitherto hath Yahweh blessed me.
content_old: 14 Then spake the sons of Joseph unto Joshua､ saying,— Why hast thou given me､ as an inheritance､ but one lot and one portion, seeing that I am a numerous people, because hitherto hath Yahweh blessed me.

content: 15 And Joshua said unto them: If a numerous people thou art get thee up to the forest, and cut down for thyself there, in the land of the Perizzites and of the Rephaim,—seeing that too narrow for thee is the hill country of Ephraim.
content_old: 15 And Joshua said unto them: If a numerous people thou art get thee up to the forest, and cut down for thyself there, in the land of the Perizzites and of the Rephaim,—seeing that too narrow for thee is the hill country of Ephraim.

content: 16 And the sons of Joseph said, The hill country is not enough for us,—and there are chariots of iron among all the Canaanites that dwell in the land of the valley, belonging both to them in Beth-shean､ and her towns, and to them in the valley of Jezreel.
content_old: 16 And the sons of Joseph said, The hill country is not enough for us,—and there are chariots of iron among all the Canaanites that dwell in the land of the valley, belonging both to them in Beth-shean､ and her towns, and to them in the valley of Jezreel.

content: 17 And Joshua made answer unto the house of Joseph, to Ephraim and to Manasseh､ saying,— A numerous people thou art､ and great vigour thou hast, thou shalt not have one lot only;
content_old: 17 And Joshua made answer unto the house of Joseph, to Ephraim and to Manasseh､ saying,— A numerous people thou art､ and great vigour thou hast, thou shalt not have one lot only;

content: 1 Then were gathered together all the assembly of the sons of Israel at Shiloh, and they set up there､ the tent of meeting,—the land having been subdued before them.
content_old: 1 Then were gathered together all the assembly of the sons of Israel at Shiloh, and they set up there､ the tent of meeting,—the land having been subdued before them.

content: 2 But there remained among the sons of Israel, to whom had not been apportioned their inheritance,—seven tribes.
content_old: 2 But there remained among the sons of Israel, to whom had not been apportioned their inheritance,—seven tribes.

content: 3 So Joshua said unto the sons of Israel,— How long will ye be too slothful, to enter in and take possession of the land, which Yahweh God of your fathers hath given unto you?
content_old: 3 So Joshua said unto the sons of Israel,— How long will ye be too slothful, to enter in and take possession of the land, which Yahweh God of your fathers hath given unto you?

content: 4 Set forth for you three men for each tribe,—that I may send them､ that they may arise—and go up and down in the land—and map it out as required for their inheritance､ and come in unto me.
content_old: 4 Set forth for you three men for each tribe,—that I may send them､ that they may arise—and go up and down in the land—and map it out as required for their inheritance､ and come in unto me.

content: 5 So shall they apportion it for themselves into seven parts,—Let Judah stay upon his boundary on the south, and the house of Joseph stay upon their boundary on the north
content_old: 5 So shall they apportion it for themselves into seven parts,—Let Judah stay upon his boundary on the south, and the house of Joseph stay upon their boundary on the north

content: 6 but ye shall map out the rest of the land､ into seven parts,—and bring in your descriptions unto me here,—then will I cast lots for you here, before Yahweh our God.
content_old: 6 but ye shall map out the rest of the land､ into seven parts,—and bring in your descriptions unto me here,—then will I cast lots for you here, before Yahweh our God.

content: 7 For Levi hath no portion in your midst, for the priesthood of Yahweh is his inheritance,—and Gad､ and Reuben､ and the half tribe of Manasseh have received their inheritance､ beyond the Jordan on the east, which Moses the servant of Yahweh gave unto them.
content_old: 7 For Levi hath no portion in your midst, for the priesthood of Yahweh is his inheritance,—and Gad､ and Reuben､ and the half tribe of Manasseh have received their inheritance､ beyond the Jordan on the east, which Moses the servant of Yahweh gave unto them.

content: 8 So the men arose､ and went,—and Joshua commanded them who were going､ to map out the land､ saying— Take your journey and go up and down in the land､ and map it out､ and return unto me, and here will I cast lots for you before Yahweh､ in Shiloh.
content_old: 8 So the men arose､ and went,—and Joshua commanded them who were going､ to map out the land､ saying— Take your journey and go up and down in the land､ and map it out､ and return unto me, and here will I cast lots for you before Yahweh､ in Shiloh.

content: 9 So the men went､ and passed through the land, and mapped it out by cities､ into seven parts､ upon a scroll,—and came in unto Joshua､ unto the camp､ in Shiloh.
content_old: 9 So the men went､ and passed through the land, and mapped it out by cities､ into seven parts､ upon a scroll,—and came in unto Joshua､ unto the camp､ in Shiloh.

content: 10 And Joshua cast for them lots､ in Shiloh､ before Yahweh,—and Joshua there apportioned the land unto the sons of Israel､ according to their portions.
content_old: 10 And Joshua cast for them lots､ in Shiloh､ before Yahweh,—and Joshua there apportioned the land unto the sons of Israel､ according to their portions.

content: 11 Then came up the lot of the tribe of the sons of Benjamin､ by their families,—and the boundary of their lot came out､ between the sons of Judah and the sons of Joseph.
content_old: 11 Then came up the lot of the tribe of the sons of Benjamin､ by their families,—and the boundary of their lot came out､ between the sons of Judah and the sons of Joseph.

content: 12 And so their boundary､ on the north border､ was from the Jordan,—and the boundary goeth up unto the side of Jericho on the north､ and goeth up in the hill country､ westward, and the extensions thereof are towards the wilderness of Beth-aven;

content: 13 and the boundary passeth over from thence towards Luz､ to the side of Luz､ southwards, the same is Bethel,—and the boundary goeth down to Ataroth-addah, by the mountain that is on the south of Beth-horon the nether;

content: 14 then turneth the boundary and goeth round the west border southward､ from the mountain which faceth Beth-horon､ southward, and so the extensions thereof are unto Kiriath-baal—the same is Kiriath-jeârim, a city of the sons of Judah,—this is the west border.

content: 17 and it turneth on the north､ and goeth out at En-shemesh, and goeth out unto Geliloth, which is over against the ascent of Adummim,—and goeth down by the Stone of Bohan､ son of Reuben;

content: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Joshua､ saying:
content_old: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Joshua､ saying:

content: 2 Speak unto the sons of Israel､ saying,— Set out for you the cities of refuge, whereof I spake unto you､ by the hand of Moses:
content_old: 2 Speak unto the sons of Israel､ saying,— Set out for you the cities of refuge, whereof I spake unto you､ by the hand of Moses:

content: 3 that the manslayer who slayeth a person by mistake､ unwittingly, may flee thither,—so shall they be unto you for refuge from the blood-redeemer,
content_old: 3 that the manslayer who slayeth a person by mistake､ unwittingly, may flee thither,—so shall they be unto you for refuge from the blood-redeemer,

content: 4 and he shall flee unto one of these cities and present himself at the entrance of the gate of the city, and shall speak､ in the ears of the elders of that city､ his defence,—and they shall take him for protection into the city unto them, and shall give him a place､ so shall he dwell with them.
content_old: 4 and he shall flee unto one of these cities and present himself at the entrance of the gate of the city, and shall speak､ in the ears of the elders of that city､ his defence,—and they shall take him for protection into the city unto them, and shall give him a place､ so shall he dwell with them.

content: 5 And when the blood-redeemer pursueth after him then shall they not deliver up the manslayer､ into his hand,—because unwittingly it was that he slew his neighbour, and had not been cherishing hatred towards him､ aforetime;
content_old: 5 And when the blood-redeemer pursueth after him then shall they not deliver up the manslayer､ into his hand,—because unwittingly it was that he slew his neighbour, and had not been cherishing hatred towards him､ aforetime;

content: 6 so shall he remain in that city､ until he standeth before the assembly､ for judgment, until the dath of the high-priest who shall be in those days,—then shall the manslayer return､ and enter into his own city､ and into his own house, within the city from whence he fled.
