content_old: 4 And when the lot came out for the families of the Kohathites then had the sons of Aaron the priest､ from among the Levites—out of the tribe of Judah and out of the tribe of the Simeonites and out of the tribe of Benjamin—by lot thirteen cities.

content: 5 And the sons of Kohath that remained had—out of the families of the tribe of Ephraim and out of the tribe of Dan and out of the half tribe of Manasseh—by lot ten cities.
content_old: 5 And the sons of Kohath that remained had—out of the families of the tribe of Ephraim and out of the tribe of Dan and out of the half tribe of Manasseh—by lot ten cities.

content: 6 And the sons of Gershon had—out of families of the tribe of Issachar and out of the tribe of Asher and out of the tribe of Naphtali and out of the half tribe of Manasseh in Bashan—by lot thirteen cities.
content_old: 6 And the sons of Gershon had—out of families of the tribe of Issachar and out of the tribe of Asher and out of the tribe of Naphtali and out of the half tribe of Manasseh in Bashan—by lot thirteen cities.

content: 7 The sons of Merari､ by their families had—out of the tribe of Reuben and out of the tribe of Gad and out of the tribe of Zebulun twelve cities.
content_old: 7 The sons of Merari､ by their families had—out of the tribe of Reuben and out of the tribe of Gad and out of the tribe of Zebulun twelve cities.

content: 8 So the sons of Israel gave unto the Levites these cities､ with their pasture lands,—as Yahweh commanded､ by the hand of Moses､ by lot.
content_old: 8 So the sons of Israel gave unto the Levites these cities､ with their pasture lands,—as Yahweh commanded､ by the hand of Moses､ by lot.

content: 9 Thus then they gave—out of the tribe of the sons of Judah and out of the tribe of the sons of Simeon—these cities which are mentioned by name.
content_old: 9 Thus then they gave—out of the tribe of the sons of Judah and out of the tribe of the sons of Simeon—these cities which are mentioned by name.

content: 10 And the sons of Aaron, from among the sons of Kohath､ from among the sons of Levi, had them,—because theirs was the first lot;
content_old: 10 And the sons of Aaron, from among the sons of Kohath､ from among the sons of Levi, had them,—because theirs was the first lot;

content: 11 yea there was given unto them､ the city of Arba､ the father of Anak､ the same is Hebron､ in the hill country of Judah,—with the pasture land thereof､ round about it;
content_old: 11 yea there was given unto them､ the city of Arba､ the father of Anak､ the same is Hebron､ in the hill country of Judah,—with the pasture land thereof､ round about it;

content: 12 whereas the fields of the city､ and the villages thereof gave they unto Caleb son of Jephunneh､ as his possession.
content_old: 12 whereas the fields of the city､ and the villages thereof gave they unto Caleb son of Jephunneh､ as his possession.

content: 13 But unto the sons of Aaron the priest gave they the city of refuge for the manslayer, even Hebron､ with the pasture lands thereof,—Libnah also､ with her pasture lands;
content_old: 13 But unto the sons of Aaron the priest gave they the city of refuge for the manslayer, even Hebron､ with the pasture lands thereof,—Libnah also､ with her pasture lands;

content: 14 and Jattir with her pasture land, and Eshtemoa with her pasture land;
content_old: 14 and Jattir with her pasture land, and Eshtemoa with her pasture land;

content: 15 and Holon､ with her pasture land, and Debir, with her pasture land;
content_old: 15 and Holon､ with her pasture land, and Debir, with her pasture land;

content: 16 and Ain､ with her pasture land, and Juttah､ with her pasture land, Beth-shemesh､ with her pasture land,—nine cities, out of these two tribes.
content_old: 16 and Ain､ with her pasture land, and Juttah､ with her pasture land, Beth-shemesh､ with her pasture land,—nine cities, out of these two tribes.

content: 17 And out of the tribe of Benjamin Gibeon､ with her pasture land,—Geba､ with her pasture land;
content_old: 17 And out of the tribe of Benjamin Gibeon､ with her pasture land,—Geba､ with her pasture land;

content: 18 Anathoth､ with her pasture land, and Almon､ with her pasture land,—four cities.
content_old: 18 Anathoth､ with her pasture land, and Almon､ with her pasture land,—four cities.

content: 19 All the cities of the sons of Aaron､ the priests were thirteen cities､ with their pasture lands.
content_old: 19 All the cities of the sons of Aaron､ the priests were thirteen cities､ with their pasture lands.

content: 20 And as for the families of the sons of Kohath､ the Levites, which remained of the sons of Kohath the cities of their lot were out of the tribe of Ephraim.
content_old: 20 And as for the families of the sons of Kohath､ the Levites, which remained of the sons of Kohath the cities of their lot were out of the tribe of Ephraim.

content: 21 So they gave unto them a city of refuge for the manslayer､ even Shechem with her pasture land､ in the hill country of Ephraim,—also Gezer､ with her pasture land;
content_old: 21 So they gave unto them a city of refuge for the manslayer､ even Shechem with her pasture land､ in the hill country of Ephraim,—also Gezer､ with her pasture land;

content: 22 and Kibzaim､ with her pasture land, and Beth-horon､ with her pasture land,—four cities.
content_old: 22 and Kibzaim､ with her pasture land, and Beth-horon､ with her pasture land,—four cities.

content: 23 And out of the tribe of Dan Elteke､ with her pasture land,—Gibbethon､ with her pasture land;
content_old: 23 And out of the tribe of Dan Elteke､ with her pasture land,—Gibbethon､ with her pasture land;

content: 24 Aijalon､ with her pasture land, Gath-rimmon､ with her pasture land,—four cities.
content_old: 24 Aijalon､ with her pasture land, Gath-rimmon､ with her pasture land,—four cities.

content: 25 And out of the half tribe of Manasseh Taanach､ with her pasture land, and Gath-rimmon､ with her pasture land,—two cities.
content_old: 25 And out of the half tribe of Manasseh Taanach､ with her pasture land, and Gath-rimmon､ with her pasture land,—two cities.

content: 26 All the cities were ten､ with their pasture lands: for the families of the sons of Kohath which remained.
content_old: 26 All the cities were ten､ with their pasture lands: for the families of the sons of Kohath which remained.

content: 27 And the sons of Gershon､ of the families of the Levites had, out of the half tribe of Manasseh a city of refuge for the manslayer, even Golan in Bashan､ with her pasture land, and Be-eshterah､ with her pasture land,��two cities.
content_old: 27 And the sons of Gershon､ of the families of the Levites had, out of the half tribe of Manasseh a city of refuge for the manslayer, even Golan in Bashan､ with her pasture land, and Be-eshterah､ with her pasture land,��two cities.

content: 28 And out of the tribe of Issachar Kishion､ with her pasture land,—Daberath､ with her pasture land;
content_old: 28 And out of the tribe of Issachar Kishion､ with her pasture land,—Daberath､ with her pasture land;

content: 29 Jarmuth､ with her pasture land, En-gannim､ with her pasture land,—four cities.
content_old: 29 Jarmuth､ with her pasture land, En-gannim､ with her pasture land,—four cities.

content: 30 And out of the tribe of Asher Mishal､ with her pasture land, Abdon､ with her pasture land;
content_old: 30 And out of the tribe of Asher Mishal､ with her pasture land, Abdon､ with her pasture land;

content: 31 Helkath､ with her pasture land, and Rehob､ with her pasture land,—four cities.
content_old: 31 Helkath､ with her pasture land, and Rehob､ with her pasture land,—four cities.

content: 32 And out of the tribe of Naphtali a city of refuge for the manslayer—even Kedesh in Galilee､ with her pasture land, and Hammoth-dor､ with her pasture land, and Kartan､ with her pasture land,—three cities.
content_old: 32 And out of the tribe of Naphtali a city of refuge for the manslayer—even Kedesh in Galilee､ with her pasture land, and Hammoth-dor､ with her pasture land, and Kartan､ with her pasture land,—three cities.

content: 33 All the cities of the Gershonites､ by their families were thirteen cities､ with their pasture lands.
content_old: 33 All the cities of the Gershonites､ by their families were thirteen cities､ with their pasture lands.

content: 34 And unto the families of the sons of Merari､ the Levites that remained out of the tribe of Zebulun Jokneam､ with her pasture land,—Kartah､ with her pasture land;
content_old: 34 And unto the families of the sons of Merari､ the Levites that remained out of the tribe of Zebulun Jokneam､ with her pasture land,—Kartah､ with her pasture land;

content: 35 Dimnah､ with her pasture land, Nahalal､ with her pasture land,—four cities.
content_old: 35 Dimnah､ with her pasture land, Nahalal､ with her pasture land,—four cities.

content: 36 And out of the tribe of Reuben Bezer､ with her, pasture land,—and Jahaz､ with her pasture land;
content_old: 36 And out of the tribe of Reuben Bezer､ with her, pasture land,—and Jahaz､ with her pasture land;

content: 37 Kedemoth､ with her pasture land and Mephaath､ with her pasture land,—four cities.
content_old: 37 Kedemoth､ with her pasture land and Mephaath､ with her pasture land,—four cities.

content: 38 And out of the tribe of Gad a city of refuge for the manslayer—even Ramoth in Gilead､ with her pasture land,—and Mahanaim､ with her pasture land;
content_old: 38 And out of the tribe of Gad a city of refuge for the manslayer—even Ramoth in Gilead､ with her pasture land,—and Mahanaim､ with her pasture land;

content: 39 Heshbon､ with her pasture land, Jazer､ with her pasture land,—in all､ four cities.
content_old: 39 Heshbon､ with her pasture land, Jazer､ with her pasture land,—in all､ four cities.

content: 40 All the cities for the sons of Merari､ by their families, who remained of the families of the Levites yea their lot was twelve cities.
content_old: 40 All the cities for the sons of Merari､ by their families, who remained of the families of the Levites yea their lot was twelve cities.

content: 41 All the cities of the Levites, in the midst of the possession of the sons of Israel were forty-eight cities､ with their pasture lands:
content_old: 41 All the cities of the Levites, in the midst of the possession of the sons of Israel were forty-eight cities､ with their pasture lands:

content: 42 these cities passed, each severally, with its pasture lands round about it; thus was it with all these cities.
content_old: 42 these cities passed, each severally, with its pasture lands round about it; thus was it with all these cities.

content: 43 So Yahweh gave unto Israel, all the land which he had sworn to give unto their fathers,—and they took possession thereof､ and dwelt therein.
content_old: 43 So Yahweh gave unto Israel, all the land which he had sworn to give unto their fathers,—and they took possession thereof､ and dwelt therein.

content: 44 And Yahweh gave them rest round about, according to all that he had sworn unto their fathers,—and there stood not a man before them､ of all their enemies, all their enemies did Yahweh deliver into their hand.
content_old: 44 And Yahweh gave them rest round about, according to all that he had sworn unto their fathers,—and there stood not a man before them､ of all their enemies, all their enemies did Yahweh deliver into their hand.

content: 1 Then called Joshua—for the Reubenites､ and for the Gadites,—and for the half tribe of Manasseh;
content_old: 1 Then called Joshua—for the Reubenites､ and for the Gadites,—and for the half tribe of Manasseh;

content: 2 and said unto them, Ye have observed all that Moses the servant of Yahweh commanded you,—and have hearkened unto my voice, in all that I commanded you:
content_old: 2 and said unto them, Ye have observed all that Moses the servant of Yahweh commanded you,—and have hearkened unto my voice, in all that I commanded you:

content: 3 ye have not forsaken your brethren､ these many days, unto this day,—but have kept the charge of the commandment of Yahweh your God.
content_old: 3 ye have not forsaken your brethren､ these many days, unto this day,—but have kept the charge of the commandment of Yahweh your God.

content: 4 Now､ therefore､ that Yahweh your God hath given rest unto your brethren, according as he spake unto them,—now､ therefore､ turn ye and get you to your homes within the land of your possession, which Moses the servant of Yahweh gave unto you､ over the Jordan.
content_old: 4 Now､ therefore､ that Yahweh your God hath given rest unto your brethren, according as he spake unto them,—now､ therefore､ turn ye and get you to your homes within the land of your possession, which Moses the servant of Yahweh gave unto you､ over the Jordan.

content: 5 Only take ye diligent heed､ to do the commandment and the law, which Moses the servant of Yahweh commanded you—to love Yahweh your God､ and to walk in all his ways､ and to keep his commandments､ and to cleave unto him,—and to serve him—with all your heart､ and with all your soul.
content_old: 5 Only take ye diligent heed､ to do the commandment and the law, which Moses the servant of Yahweh commanded you—to love Yahweh your God､ and to walk in all his ways､ and to keep his commandments､ and to cleave unto him,—and to serve him—with all your heart､ and with all your soul.

content: 6 So Joshua blessed them,—and sent them away, and they took their journey unto their homes.
content_old: 6 So Joshua blessed them,—and sent them away, and they took their journey unto their homes.

content: 7 Now unto the one half tribe of Manesseh had Moses given a possession in Bashan, and unto the other half did Joshua give possession with their brethren, over the Jordan､ westward,—moreover also when Joshua sent them away unto their homes he blessed them,
content_old: 7 Now unto the one half tribe of Manesseh had Moses given a possession in Bashan, and unto the other half did Joshua give possession with their brethren, over the Jordan､ westward,—moreover also when Joshua sent them away unto their homes he blessed them,

content: 8 and spake unto them､ saying— With much wealth return ye unto your homes, even with very much cattle, with silver and with gold､ and with copper and with iron､ and with very much raiment,—divide ye the spoil of your enemies with your brethren.
content_old: 8 and spake unto them､ saying— With much wealth return ye unto your homes, even with very much cattle, with silver and with gold､ and with copper and with iron､ and with very much raiment,—divide ye the spoil of your enemies with your brethren.

content: 9 So the sons of Reuben and the sons of Gad and the half tribe of Manasseh､ returned and departed from the sons of Israel, from Shiloh､ which was in the land of Canaan,—to go unto the land of Gilead､ unto the land of their possession､ wherein they had received their possessions, at the bidding of Yahweh by the hand of Moses.
content_old: 9 So the sons of Reuben and the sons of Gad and the half tribe of Manasseh､ returned and departed from the sons of Israel, from Shiloh､ which was in the land of Canaan,—to go unto the land of Gilead､ unto the land of their possession､ wherein they had received their possessions, at the bidding of Yahweh by the hand of Moses.

content: 10 And when they came into the circles of the Jordan, which were in the land of Canaan,—then did the sons of Reuben and the sons of Gad and the half tribe of Manasseh build there an altar by the Jordan, an altar of large dimensions,
content_old: 10 And when they came into the circles of the Jordan, which were in the land of Canaan,—then did the sons of Reuben and the sons of Gad and the half tribe of Manasseh build there an altar by the Jordan, an altar of large dimensions,

content: 11 And the sons of Israel heard say,— Lo! the sons of Reuben and the sons of Gad and the half tribe of Manasseh have built an altar in front of the land of Canaan, in the circles of the Jordan､ in the region opposite the sons of Israel.
content_old: 11 And the sons of Israel heard say,— Lo! the sons of Reuben and the sons of Gad and the half tribe of Manasseh have built an altar in front of the land of Canaan, in the circles of the Jordan､ in the region opposite the sons of Israel.

content: 12 And when the sons of Israel heard all the assembly of the sons of Israel gathered themselves together at Shiloh, to go up against them to war.
content_old: 12 And when the sons of Israel heard all the assembly of the sons of Israel gathered themselves together at Shiloh, to go up against them to war.

content: 13 And the sons of Israel sent unto the sons of Reuben and unto the sons of Gad and unto the half tribe of Manasseh､ within the land of Gilead,—Phinehas､ son of Eleazar the priest;
content_old: 13 And the sons of Israel sent unto the sons of Reuben and unto the sons of Gad and unto the half tribe of Manasseh､ within the land of Gilead,—Phinehas､ son of Eleazar the priest;

content: 14 and ten princes with him, one prince of an ancestral house for each of the tribes of Israel,—they being severally heads of their ancestral houses among the thousands of Israel.
content_old: 14 and ten princes with him, one prince of an ancestral house for each of the tribes of Israel,—they being severally heads of their ancestral houses among the thousands of Israel.

content: 15 So they came in unto the sons of Reuben and unto the sons of Gad and unto the half tribe of Manasseh､ within the land of Gilead,—and spake with them､ saying:
content_old: 15 So they came in unto the sons of Reuben and unto the sons of Gad and unto the half tribe of Manasseh､ within the land of Gilead,—and spake with them､ saying:

content: 16 Thus say all the assembly of Yahweh— What is this act of treachery which ye have committed against the God of Israel, that ye should turn back､ to-day, from following Yahweh,—in that ye have builded you an altar, that ye might rebel､ to-day､ against Yahweh?
content_old: 16 Thus say all the assembly of Yahweh— What is this act of treachery which ye have committed against the God of Israel, that ye should turn back､ to-day, from following Yahweh,—in that ye have builded you an altar, that ye might rebel､ to-day､ against Yahweh?

content: 17 Too little for us was the iniquity of Peor, from which we have not cleansed ourselves､ unto this day,—although the plague came upon the assembly of Yahweh;
content_old: 17 Too little for us was the iniquity of Peor, from which we have not cleansed ourselves､ unto this day,—although the plague came upon the assembly of Yahweh;

content: 18 but that ye must turn back to-day from following Yahweh,—though it must needs be that if ye rebel to-day against Yahweh then to-morrow with all the assembly of Israel will he be wroth?
content_old: 18 but that ye must turn back to-day from following Yahweh,—though it must needs be that if ye rebel to-day against Yahweh then to-morrow with all the assembly of Israel will he be wroth?

content: 19 Howbeit if unclean be the land of your possession do ye on your part come over into the land of the possession of Yahweh､ where abideth the habitation of Yahweh, and take your possession in our midst,—but against Yahweh do not rebel, nor against us rebel, by building yourselves an altar apart from the altar of Yahweh our God.
content_old: 19 Howbeit if unclean be the land of your possession do ye on your part come over into the land of the possession of Yahweh､ where abideth the habitation of Yahweh, and take your possession in our midst,—but against Yahweh do not rebel, nor against us rebel, by building yourselves an altar apart from the altar of Yahweh our God.

content: 20 Did not Achan son of Zerah commit an act of treachery､ with a devoted thing, and upon all the assembly of Israel came wrath,—so that not he—one man alone died in his iniquity?
content_old: 20 Did not Achan son of Zerah commit an act of treachery､ with a devoted thing, and upon all the assembly of Israel came wrath,—so that not he—one man alone died in his iniquity?

content: 21 Then responded the sons of Reuben and the sons of Gad and the half tribe of Manasseh,—and spake unto the heads of the thousands of Israel:
content_old: 21 Then responded the sons of Reuben and the sons of Gad and the half tribe of Manasseh,—and spake unto the heads of the thousands of Israel:

content: 22 Êl-Elohim-Yahweh､ Êl-Elohim-Yahweh he knoweth, and Israel he shall know,—if in rebellion､ or if in treachery､ against Yahweh do not save us this day:
content_old: 22 Êl-Elohim-Yahweh､ Êl-Elohim-Yahweh he knoweth, and Israel he shall know,—if in rebellion､ or if in treachery､ against Yahweh do not save us this day:

content: 23 that we should build for ourselves an altar, to turn back from following Yahweh,—or if that we might cause to go up thereon ascending-sacrifice or meal-offering､ or if that we might offer thereon peace-offerings let Yahweh himself require it;
content_old: 23 that we should build for ourselves an altar, to turn back from following Yahweh,—or if that we might cause to go up thereon ascending-sacrifice or meal-offering､ or if that we might offer thereon peace-offerings let Yahweh himself require it;

content: 24 if, indeed, we have not､ rather､ out of anxiety and of purpose done this thing､ saying,— In time to come your sons might speak to our sons､ saying, What have ye to do with Yahweh､ God of Israel;
content_old: 24 if, indeed, we have not､ rather､ out of anxiety and of purpose done this thing､ saying,— In time to come your sons might speak to our sons､ saying, What have ye to do with Yahweh､ God of Israel;

content: 25 seeing that a boundary hath Yahweh put between us and you､ ye sons of Reuben and ye sons of Gad—even the Jordan, ye have no portion in Yahweh,— so might your sons cause our sons､ to cease from revering Yahweh.
content_old: 25 seeing that a boundary hath Yahweh put between us and you､ ye sons of Reuben and ye sons of Gad—even the Jordan, ye have no portion in Yahweh,— so might your sons cause our sons､ to cease from revering Yahweh.

content: 26 We said､ therefore, Let us prepare､ we pray you､ to build us an altar,— not for ascending-offering､ nor for sacrifice;
content_old: 26 We said､ therefore, Let us prepare､ we pray you､ to build us an altar,— not for ascending-offering､ nor for sacrifice;

content: 27 but that a witness it may be between us and you､ and between our generations after us, that we are to do the service of Yahweh､ before him, with our ascending-offerings and with our sacrifices､ and with our peace-offerings,—that your sons may not say､ in time to come､ to our sons, Ye have no portion in Yahweh.
content_old: 27 but that a witness it may be between us and you､ and between our generations after us, that we are to do the service of Yahweh､ before him, with our ascending-offerings and with our sacrifices､ and with our peace-offerings,—that your sons may not say､ in time to come､ to our sons, Ye have no portion in Yahweh.

content: 28 Therefore said we､ And it shall be､ when they so say to us､ or to our generations､ in time to come,—that we will say— Behold ye the pattern of the altar of Yahweh､ which our fathers made､ not for ascending-offerings nor for sacrifice, but that a witness it might be between us and you.
content_old: 28 Therefore said we､ And it shall be､ when they so say to us､ or to our generations､ in time to come,—that we will say— Behold ye the pattern of the altar of Yahweh､ which our fathers made､ not for ascending-offerings nor for sacrifice, but that a witness it might be between us and you.

content: 29 Far be it from us—that we should rebel against Yahweh､ or turn back､ to-day､ from following Yahweh､ by building an altar, for ascending-offering､ or meal-offering or for sacrifice,—other than the altar of Yahweh our God, which is before his habitation.
content_old: 29 Far be it from us—that we should rebel against Yahweh､ or turn back､ to-day､ from following Yahweh､ by building an altar, for ascending-offering､ or meal-offering or for sacrifice,—other than the altar of Yahweh our God, which is before his habitation.

content: 30 And when Phinehas the priest､ and the princes of the assembly､ even the heads of the thousands of Israel who were with him､ heard the words which the sons of Reuben and the sons of Gad and the sons of Manasseh spake then was it well-pleasing in their eyes.
content_old: 30 And when Phinehas the priest､ and the princes of the assembly､ even the heads of the thousands of Israel who were with him､ heard the words which the sons of Reuben and the sons of Gad and the sons of Manasseh spake then was it well-pleasing in their eyes.

content: 31 And Phinehas son of Eleazar the priest said unto the sons of Reuben and unto the sons of Gad and unto the sons of Manasseh— To-day we know that in our midst is Yahweh, in that ye have not committed､ against Yahweh､ this act of treachery,—now have ye rescued the sons of Israel out of the hand of Yahweh.
content_old: 31 And Phinehas son of Eleazar the priest said unto the sons of Reuben and unto the sons of Gad and unto the sons of Manasseh— To-day we know that in our midst is Yahweh, in that ye have not committed､ against Yahweh､ this act of treachery,—now have ye rescued the sons of Israel out of the hand of Yahweh.

content: 32 So Phinehas son of Eleazar the priest and the princes returned from the sons of Reuben and from the sons of Gad､ out of the land of Gilead､ unto the land of Canaan､ unto the sons of Israel,—and brought them back word.
content_old: 32 So Phinehas son of Eleazar the priest and the princes returned from the sons of Reuben and from the sons of Gad､ out of the land of Gilead､ unto the land of Canaan､ unto the sons of Israel,—and brought them back word.

content: 33 And the thing was well-pleasing in the eyes of the sons of Israel, and the sons of Israel blessed God,—and spake not of going up against them､ to war, to lay waste the land､ wherein the sons of Reuben and the sons of Gad dwelt.
content_old: 33 And the thing was well-pleasing in the eyes of the sons of Israel, and the sons of Israel blessed God,—and spake not of going up against them､ to war, to lay waste the land､ wherein the sons of Reuben and the sons of Gad dwelt.

content: 1 And it came to pass after many days, when Yahweh had given rest unto Israel､ from all their enemies round about,—and Joshua had become old, advanced in days
content_old: 1 And it came to pass after many days, when Yahweh had given rest unto Israel､ from all their enemies round about,—and Joshua had become old, advanced in days

content: 2 that Joshua called for all Israel, for their elders､ and for their heads, and for their judges､ and for their officers,—and said unto them, I am old, advanced in days;
content_old: 2 that Joshua called for all Israel, for their elders､ and for their heads, and for their judges､ and for their officers,—and said unto them, I am old, advanced in days;

content: 3 but ye have seen—all that Yahweh your God hath done unto all these nations､ because of you,—for Yahweh your God is he that hath fought for you.
content_old: 3 but ye have seen—all that Yahweh your God hath done unto all these nations､ because of you,—for Yahweh your God is he that hath fought for you.

content: 4 Behold､ I have allotted to you these nations which remain､ as an inheritance､ for your tribes,—from the Jordan､ and all the nations which I have cut off､ even unto the great sea､ at the going in of the sun.
content_old: 4 Behold､ I have allotted to you these nations which remain､ as an inheritance､ for your tribes,—from the Jordan､ and all the nations which I have cut off､ even unto the great sea､ at the going in of the sun.

content: 5 But Yahweh your God—he will thrust them out from before you, and drive them away out of your sight,—so shall ye possess their land, as Yahweh your God spake unto you.
content_old: 5 But Yahweh your God—he will thrust them out from before you, and drive them away out of your sight,—so shall ye possess their land, as Yahweh your God spake unto you.

content: 6 Therefore must ye be very firm to observe and to do all that is written in the scroll of the law of Moses,—so as not to turn aside therefrom､ to the right hand or to the left;
content_old: 6 Therefore must ye be very firm to observe and to do all that is written in the scroll of the law of Moses,—so as not to turn aside therefrom､ to the right hand or to the left;

content: 7 so as not to go in among these nations, these which remain with you,—and with the name of their gods shall ye neither make memorial nor put on oath, and neither serve them､ nor bow down to them.
content_old: 7 so as not to go in among these nations, these which remain with you,—and with the name of their gods shall ye neither make memorial nor put on oath, and neither serve them､ nor bow down to them.

content: 8 But unto Yahweh your God must ye cleave,—as ye have done until this day;
content_old: 8 But unto Yahweh your God must ye cleave,—as ye have done until this day;

content: 9 therefore hath Yahweh dispossessed､ from before you､ nations great and strong,—but as for you not a man hath stood before you, until this day.
content_old: 9 therefore hath Yahweh dispossessed､ from before you､ nations great and strong,—but as for you not a man hath stood before you, until this day.

content: 10 One man of you can chase a thousand,—for Yahweh your God is he that fighteth for you, as he spake to you.
content_old: 10 One man of you can chase a thousand,—for Yahweh your God is he that fighteth for you, as he spake to you.

content: 11 Take diligent heed､ therefore､ unto your souls,—to love Yahweh your God.
content_old: 11 Take diligent heed､ therefore､ unto your souls,—to love Yahweh your God.

content: 12 But if ye do in any wise turn back and cleave unto the remnant of these nations, these which remain with you,—and intermarry with them､ and go in with them､ and they with you;
content_old: 12 But if ye do in any wise turn back and cleave unto the remnant of these nations, these which remain with you,—and intermarry with them､ and go in with them､ and they with you;

content: 13 know that Yahweh your God will no further drive out these nations from before you,—but they will become unto you a snare and a hook､ and a goad in your sides､ and thorns in your eyes, until ye have perished from off this goodly soil, which Yahweh your God hath given unto you.
content_old: 13 know that Yahweh your God will no further drive out these nations from before you,—but they will become unto you a snare and a hook､ and a goad in your sides､ and thorns in your eyes, until ye have perished from off this goodly soil, which Yahweh your God hath given unto you.

content: 14 But lo! I am going to-day, in the way of all the earth,—ye must acknowledge､ therefore､ with all your heart and with all your soul､ that there hath not failed a single thing､ out of all the good things which Yahweh your God spake concerning you, the whole hath come to pass to you, there hath not failed thereof､ a single thing.
content_old: 14 But lo! I am going to-day, in the way of all the earth,—ye must acknowledge､ therefore､ with all your heart and with all your soul､ that there hath not failed a single thing､ out of all the good things which Yahweh your God spake concerning you, the whole hath come to pass to you, there hath not failed thereof､ a single thing.

content: 15 But it shall be that as all the good things have come unto you, which Yahweh your God spake unto you, so will Yahweh bring upon you all the evil things, until he hath destroyed you from off this goodly soil, which Yahweh your God hath given unto you.
content_old: 15 But it shall be that as all the good things have come unto you, which Yahweh your God spake unto you, so will Yahweh bring upon you all the evil things, until he hath destroyed you from off this goodly soil, which Yahweh your God hath given unto you.

content: 1 And Joshua gathered together all the tribes of Israel､ unto Shechem,—and called for the elders of Israel､ and for their heads､ and for their judges､ and for their officers, and they presented themselves before God.
content_old: 1 And Joshua gathered together all the tribes of Israel､ unto Shechem,—and called for the elders of Israel､ and for their heads､ and for their judges､ and for their officers, and they presented themselves before God.

content: 2 Then said Joshua unto all the people— Thus saith Yahweh､ God of Israel, Beyond the River dwelt your fathers from age-past times, unto Terah､ father of Abraham､ and father of Nahor,—and they served other gods.
content_old: 2 Then said Joshua unto all the people— Thus saith Yahweh､ God of Israel, Beyond the River dwelt your fathers from age-past times, unto Terah､ father of Abraham､ and father of Nahor,—and they served other gods.

content: 3 So I took your father､ Abraham､ from beyond the River, and led him through all the land of Canaan,—and multiplied his seed, and gave unto him､ Isaac;
content_old: 3 So I took your father､ Abraham､ from beyond the River, and led him through all the land of Canaan,—and multiplied his seed, and gave unto him､ Isaac;

content: 4 and gave unto Isaac Jacob and Esau,—and gave unto Esau､ Mount Seir､ to possess it, but Jacob and his sons went down into Egypt.
content_old: 4 and gave unto Isaac Jacob and Esau,—and gave unto Esau､ Mount Seir､ to possess it, but Jacob and his sons went down into Egypt.

content: 5 Then sent I Moses and Aaron､ and plagued Egypt, according to that which I did in their midst,—and afterwards brought you forth.
content_old: 5 Then sent I Moses and Aaron､ and plagued Egypt, according to that which I did in their midst,—and afterwards brought you forth.

content: 6 Yea I brought forth your fathers､ out of Egypt, and ye came unto the sea, and the Egyptians pursued after your fathers､ with chariots and with horsemen､ unto the Red Sea.
content_old: 6 Yea I brought forth your fathers､ out of Egypt, and ye came unto the sea, and the Egyptians pursued after your fathers､ with chariots and with horsemen､ unto the Red Sea.

content: 7 So they made outcry unto Yahweh､ and he put darkness between you and the Egyptians､ and brought in upon them the sea､ and covered them,—and your eyes beheld what I did with the Egyptians. And when ye had remained in the desert many days
content_old: 7 So they made outcry unto Yahweh､ and he put darkness between you and the Egyptians､ and brought in upon them the sea､ and covered them,—and your eyes beheld what I did with the Egyptians. And when ye had remained in the desert many days

content: 8 then I brought you into the land of the Amorites､ who were dwelling over the Jordan, and they fought with you,—then delivered I them into your hand､ and ye took possession of their land, so I destroyed them from before you.
content_old: 8 then I brought you into the land of the Amorites､ who were dwelling over the Jordan, and they fought with you,—then delivered I them into your hand､ and ye took possession of their land, so I destroyed them from before you.

content: 9 Then rose up Balak､ son of Zippor､ king of Moab, and made war with Israel,—and sent and called for Balaam son of Beor､ to curse you;
content_old: 9 Then rose up Balak､ son of Zippor､ king of Moab, and made war with Israel,—and sent and called for Balaam son of Beor､ to curse you;

content: 10 but I was not willing to hearken unto Balaam,—so he kept on blessing you, and I rescued you out of his hand.
content_old: 10 but I was not willing to hearken unto Balaam,—so he kept on blessing you, and I rescued you out of his hand.

content: 11 Then passed ye over the Jordan､ and came in unto Jericho, and when they would have made war with you—even the lords of Jericho—the Amorite and the Perizzite and the Canaanite and the Hittite and the Girgashite, the Hivite and the Jebusite then delivered I them into your hand.
content_old: 11 Then passed ye over the Jordan､ and came in unto Jericho, and when they would have made war with you—even the lords of Jericho—the Amorite and the Perizzite and the Canaanite and the Hittite and the Girgashite, the Hivite and the Jebusite then delivered I them into your hand.

content: 12 And I sent before you the hornet, which drave them out from before you, the two kings of the Amorites,—not with thy sword､ nor with thy bow.
content_old: 12 And I sent before you the hornet, which drave them out from before you, the two kings of the Amorites,—not with thy sword､ nor with thy bow.

content: 13 Thus I gave unto you a land on which thou hadst not laboured､ and cities which ye had not built, and ye proceeded to dwell therein,—of vineyards and oliveyards､ which ye planted not ye are eating.
content_old: 13 Thus I gave unto you a land on which thou hadst not laboured､ and cities which ye had not built, and ye proceeded to dwell therein,—of vineyards and oliveyards､ which ye planted not ye are eating.

content: 14 Now therefore､ revere ye Yahweh､ and serve him､ in sincerity and in truth,—and put away the gods which your fathers served beyond the River､ and in Egypt, and serve ye Yahweh.
content_old: 14 Now therefore､ revere ye Yahweh､ and serve him､ in sincerity and in truth,—and put away the gods which your fathers served beyond the River､ and in Egypt, and serve ye Yahweh.

content: 15 But if it be a vexation in your eyes､ to serve Yahweh choose ye for yourselves､ to-day､ whom ye will serve, whether the gods which your fathers served､ that were beyond the River, or the gods of the Amorites､ in whose land ye are dwelling,—but I and my house will serve Yahweh.
content_old: 15 But if it be a vexation in your eyes､ to serve Yahweh choose ye for yourselves､ to-day､ whom ye will serve, whether the gods which your fathers served､ that were beyond the River, or the gods of the Amorites､ in whose land ye are dwelling,—but I and my house will serve Yahweh.

content: 16 Then responded the people､ and said, Far be it from us, that we should forsake Yahweh,—to serve other gods;
content_old: 16 Then responded the people､ and said, Far be it from us, that we should forsake Yahweh,—to serve other gods;

content: 17 for as for Yahweh our God he brought up both us and our fathers､ out of the land of Egypt､ out of the house of servants,—and who did before our eyes､ these great signs, and preserved us throughout all the way wherein we journeyed, and among all the peoples through the midst of whom we passed､;
content_old: 17 for as for Yahweh our God he brought up both us and our fathers､ out of the land of Egypt､ out of the house of servants,—and who did before our eyes､ these great signs, and preserved us throughout all the way wherein we journeyed, and among all the peoples through the midst of whom we passed､;

content: 18 then did Yahweh drive out all the peoples､ even the Amorites who were dwelling in the land､ from before us,—we too will serve Yahweh, for he is our God.
content_old: 18 then did Yahweh drive out all the peoples､ even the Amorites who were dwelling in the land､ from before us,—we too will serve Yahweh, for he is our God.

content: 19 Then said Joshua unto the people— Ye cannot serve Yahweh, for a holy God he is a jealous GOD he is, he will not forgive your transgression､ nor your sins.
content_old: 19 Then said Joshua unto the people— Ye cannot serve Yahweh, for a holy God he is a jealous GOD he is, he will not forgive your transgression､ nor your sins.

content: 20 When ye forsake Yahweh, and serve the gods of a stranger then will he turn, and inflict on you calamity､ and consume you, after that he hath dealt well with you.
content_old: 20 When ye forsake Yahweh, and serve the gods of a stranger then will he turn, and inflict on you calamity､ and consume you, after that he hath dealt well with you.

content: 21 But the people said unto Joshua,— Nay! but Yahweh will we serve.
content_old: 21 But the people said unto Joshua,— Nay! but Yahweh will we serve.

content: 22 Then said Joshua unto the people— Witnesses are ye against yourselves, that ye yourselves have chosen you Yahweh､ to serve him. And they said: Witnesses!
content_old: 22 Then said Joshua unto the people— Witnesses are ye against yourselves, that ye yourselves have chosen you Yahweh､ to serve him. And they said: Witnesses!

content: 23 Now therefore､ put ye away the gods of the stranger､ that are in your midst,—and incline your heart unto Yahweh､ God of Israel.
content_old: 23 Now therefore､ put ye away the gods of the stranger､ that are in your midst,—and incline your heart unto Yahweh､ God of Israel.

content: 24 And the people said unto Joshua,— Yahweh our God will we serve, and unto his voice will we hearken.
content_old: 24 And the people said unto Joshua,— Yahweh our God will we serve, and unto his voice will we hearken.

content: 25 So then Joshua solemnised a covenant for the people､ on that day,—and set for them a statute and a regulation､ in Shechem.
content_old: 25 So then Joshua solemnised a covenant for the people､ on that day,—and set for them a statute and a regulation､ in Shechem.

content: 26 And Joshua wrote these words in the scroll of the law of God,—and took a great stone, and set it up there, under the oak that was by the sanctuary of Yahweh.
content_old: 26 And Joshua wrote these words in the scroll of the law of God,—and took a great stone, and set it up there, under the oak that was by the sanctuary of Yahweh.

content: 27 And Joshua said unto all the people— Lo! this stone shall serve against us as a witness, for it hath heard all the sayings of Yahweh, which he hath spoken with us,—so shall it serve against you as a witness, lest ye should act deceptively against your God.
content_old: 27 And Joshua said unto all the people— Lo! this stone shall serve against us as a witness, for it hath heard all the sayings of Yahweh, which he hath spoken with us,—so shall it serve against you as a witness, lest ye should act deceptively against your God.

content: 28 And Joshua sent the people away, every man unto his inheritance.
content_old: 28 And Joshua sent the people away, every man unto his inheritance.

content: 29 And it came to pass after these things, that Joshua son of Nun､ servant of Yahweh､ died, being a hundred and ten years old.
content_old: 29 And it came to pass after these things, that Joshua son of Nun､ servant of Yahweh､ died, being a hundred and ten years old.

content: 30 And they buried him within the bounds of his own inheritance, in Timnath-serah, which is in the hill country of Ephraim, on the north of Mount Gaash.
content_old: 30 And they buried him within the bounds of his own inheritance, in Timnath-serah, which is in the hill country of Ephraim, on the north of Mount Gaash.

content: 31 So then Israel served Yahweh all the days of Joshua,—and all the days of the elders who prolonged their days after Joshua, and who had known all the work of Yahweh､ which he had wrought for Israel.
content_old: 31 So then Israel served Yahweh all the days of Joshua,—and all the days of the elders who prolonged their days after Joshua, and who had known all the work of Yahweh､ which he had wrought for Israel.

content: 32 And the bones of Joseph—which the sons of Israel had brought up out of Egypt buried they in Shechem, in the portion of field､ which Jacob bought of the sons of Hamor､ father of Shechem､ for a hundred pieces of money,—and they belonged unto the sons of Joseph､ as an inheritance.
content_old: 32 And the bones of Joseph—which the sons of Israel had brought up out of Egypt buried they in Shechem, in the portion of field､ which Jacob bought of the sons of Hamor､ father of Shechem､ for a hundred pieces of money,—and they belonged unto the sons of Joseph､ as an inheritance.
